thread.section_title: DriveAway Holidays Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveAway Holidays Australia | driveaway.com.au
thread.title: ALFRED
thread.title_full: DriveAway Holidays Australia reviewed by ALFRED

author: ALFRED
title: ALFRED
text: Thank you for your fabulous help in sourcing us a 3 day car hire for our Tuscany countryside trip. We were having difficulty trying to arrange a different drop off location to our pick up spot. The team at DriveAway were full of knowledge; prompt and we have now thankfully got our car booked and paid for at an excellent price too.
